answers.answer: Iam going through the samething went to the doc Wednesday n they told me my blood pressure was 158/90 I had to go str8 to the hospital they test me for the samething everything came bk good I also have an appointment again monday to see how my blood pressure if not to good they will schedule my c section early if good they will schedule at 39 weeks
How far along are you now? I'm 37 weeks today. My BP was about the same.

I've been going through this for 3 weeks now. Horrible headaches high blood pressure but all other tests are fine. I've had an ultrasound done every week for the last 3 weeks and will continue to have one done weekly until baby arrives.  I'll be 37 weeks Tuesday. Doctor is wanting to induce between 38 and 39 weeks.

That's good to know Shelby! I'm at my doctor's appointment now. I'm hoping they at least keep me out of work from now on. But my doctors office is weird about that as well so that worries me since I have a very physically and mentally stressful job! I hope everything works out for you!

Just watch it carefully i had all the tests done with my first son all negative when i got to 39 weeks my bp was way higher and i had to be induced, just watch for swelling dizziness vision changes and if u have any signs like that go in! Hope it goes better for u!

Hi ladies. I went to the doctors on Monday and my bp kept getting higher so we decided to go ahead and induce. I had my baby boy on Tuesday,  January 27th at 1:41 pm. He weighed 6lbs 3 oz and was 20 1/4 inches long. I was kept in the high risk unit in maternity on bed rest until I was on medicine for 24 hours to treat pre-eclampsia. I appreciate everyone's help and advice on this post and wish all of you ladies the best of luck!

I was in my non stress test Wednesday and they had me go to L&D to be monitored because my blood pressure was high. I was having contractions strong and long.  I was admitted and told they were going to break my water... I'm 3 cms and 100% effaced but because I'm not 39 weeks yet they won't induce and since I wasn't progressing any further They discharged me 9 hours later telling me I tested negative for preeclampsia. My feet are swollen and tingly my hands too. I'm cramping at home and very uncomfortable. I'm 37 weeks 5 days now.  My next stress test is this coming Wednesday along with my 38 week check up. What should tell them when I go in or what she I watch out for between now and my next appointment?

All thats normal they will just tell u that u will have swollen until the baby arrive u also dont wanna have ur baby early due to the baby might have complication due to early labor thats y they stop it so just keep the baby in as long as possible I went through the something the doc said everything came back good no preeclampsia but I will still have the swollen til the baby arrive

question: I went to the hospital last night because I was cramping. Turns out I was not in labor, but my BP was high. After testing for pre-eclampsia, they sent me home and told me to do at home testing since my BP was not too bad and the tests came back OK. They will test more tomorrow to determine what needs to be done. This is the first time ever that my BP was off. Any of you ladies ever have issues with pre-eclampsia or something similar to this? I'm OK with being induced, but this waiting to see makes me nervous.
title: pre-eclampsia???
